dbi.mysql.MysqlResult

Authors:
The D DBI project

class MysqlResult: dbi.BaseResult.BaseResult;
Manage the results of a mysql result set. This class implements all of the current DBD Result interface. The interface is not described here again, instead please view Result directly.
